Medicine_tweet_75_p$Medicine_tweet_65_p$.text:
Finding A: We consider that the aluminium content of all infant formulas investigated herein is too high and especially so considering that these products constitute either all or a substantial proportion of an infant\'s diet in the first months of their lives.
Finding B: Continued exposure to Barbie in early childhood may lead girls to not only adopt a thin ideal but also, in combination with a variety of other thin-ideal transmitters, may prime them to more readily accept future thin-ideal promoting messages.
Finding C: Activation of macrophages in the presence of high NaCl concentrations modified epigenetic markers and enhanced p38 mitogen-activated protein kinase (p38/MAPK)-dependent nuclear factor of activated T cells 5 (NFAT5) activation.
Finding D: In men, the risk reduction was 19% in the group consuming >54 g compared to no apple intake .

Finding C: Activation of macrophages in the presence of high NaCl concentrations modified epigenetic markers and enhanced p38 mitogen-activated protein kinase (p38/MAPK)-dependent nuclear factor of activated T cells 5 (NFAT5) activation.

Medicine_41_p$Medicine_70_r$Medicine_400.text:
Finding A: Aspirin use was associated with significant reductions in the composite cardiovascular outcome compared with no aspirin (57.1 per 10 000 participant-years with aspirin and 61.4 per 10 000 participant-years with no aspirin) (hazard ratio CONCLUSIONS AND RELEVANCE The use of aspirin in individuals without cardiovascular disease was associated with a lower risk of cardiovascular events and an increased risk of major bleeding.
Finding B: "Since manufacturers are not willing to address the aluminium content of infant formulas it must now be time for the government, through the Food Standards Agency, to provide guidance on this matter and to indicate a maximum allowable concentration, for example, 50 ppb (50 mg/L) aluminium in the product at point of use, as a precautionary step to protect infants against chronic aluminium intoxication during the earliest weeks, months and years of their lives."
Finding C: Major findings also indicated that low levels of parental monitoring, poor parental communication and housing instability were significantly associated with gang involvement.
Finding D: Policies that incentivize providers and health systems to use telehealth could be an important way to increase access to care for underserved populations.

Finding A: Aspirin use was associated with significant reductions in the composite cardiovascular outcome compared with no aspirin (57.1 per 10 000 participant-years with aspirin and 61.4 per 10 000 participant-years with no aspirin) (hazard ratio CONCLUSIONS AND RELEVANCE The use of aspirin in individuals without cardiovascular disease was associated with a lower risk of cardiovascular events and an increased risk of major bleeding.
Finding B: "Since manufacturers are not willing to address the aluminium content of infant formulas it must now be time for the government, through the Food Standards Agency, to provide guidance on this matter and to indicate a maximum allowable concentration, for example, 50 ppb (50 mg/L) aluminium in the product at point of use, as a precautionary step to protect infants against chronic aluminium intoxication during the earliest weeks, months and years of their lives."
Finding C: Major findings also indicated that low levels of parental monitoring, poor parental communication and housing instability were significantly associated with gang involvement.
Finding D: Policies that incentivize providers and health systems to use telehealth could be an important way to increase access to care for underserved populations.

Medicine_tweet_75_r$Medicine_tweet_20_p$.text:
Finding A: What are the FSA @username doing about the high levels of aluminium found in UK baby milk?
Finding B: These findings suggest that clinicians treating women with PMDD should assess and be vigilant for signs of suicidal behavior, and that clinicians might evaluate and treat the premenstrual symptoms of women who express suicidal ideation, plans, or attempts.
Finding C: They found that the two methods are comparable in accuracy when checked against actual survey-based census data, but estimates from mobile phone data can provide more timely information, down to the hours.
Finding D: The researchers were surprised to discover that during the winter, when the bats are hibernating, the fungus can infect nearly every bat in a colony.

Medicine_70_p$Medicine_346_p$Medicine_tw.text:
Finding A: It is the opinion of the authors that regulatory and other nonvoluntary methods are now required to reduce the aluminium content of infant formulas and thereby protect infants from chronic exposure to dietary aluminium.
Finding B: Overall, our findings emphasize the utility of thorough assessment and treatment of mood and sleep conditions, to decrease the likelihood of requiring psychiatric hospitalization.
Finding C: Yes. Food ads do make you fatter. #diet #nutrition #food
Finding D: The population prevalence of symptomatic radiographic foot OA in adults aged 50 years and over was 16.7% (95% CI 15.3% to 18.0%).

Medicine_tweet_163_p$Medicine_117_p$Medi.text:
Finding A: In conclusion, low HRV may be a risk factor for female sexual arousal dysfunction and overall sexual dysfunction.
Finding B: We then analyze the patterns for different socioeconomic groups and parities and show that the changes in subjective well-being over the transition to parenthood are highly consistent with the low and late fertility behavior that has emerged during the second demographic transition: older parents and those with more socioeconomic resources have the strongest happiness gains around the time of birth, and the temporary happiness gain around the time of birth declines with the number of children that one already has.
Finding C: Acute hormonal responses were correlated with gains in lean body mass (LBM), muscle fibre cross-sectional area (CSA) and leg press strength.
Finding D: High School Students’ Use of Electronic Cigarettes to Vaporize Cannabis\nMorean PhD, Kong PhD et alPediatrics Oct 2015

Finding C: Acute hormonal responses were correlated with gains in lean body mass (LBM), muscle fibre cross-sectional area (CSA) and leg press strength.

Finding B: The present work is the first, in both animal and human, to show that tissues harvested from cadaveric ligaments up to 72 hours postmortem represent an available reservoir of specific stem cell populations.
Finding C: NEW RESEARCH finds that memory consolidation and reconsolidation share common behavioural and neurochemical mechanisms From researchers at @username & #UniversityofRegensburg
Finding D: Analysis also shows an amplification of this new teleconnection over the past four decades.

Medicine_170_p$Medicine_425_p$Medicine_4.text:
Finding A: In our study, higher ANO7 mRNA expression strongly correlated with poor overall survival in PrCa patients.
Finding B: In this prospective analysis, vegetable fat intake after diagnosis was associated with a lower risk of lethal prostate cancer and all-cause mortality.
Finding C: These suggest that T-cell senescence-mediated reprogramming of metabolic pathways may be associated with development of diabetes and its complications, as well as other aging-related diseases.
Finding D: This suggests that marine top predators are important in climate regulation, although they are mostly left out of climate models, Nevitt said.

Medicine_434_p$Medicine_tweet_23_r$Medic.text:
Finding A: They found a J-shaped association between frequency of drinking and IQ test results, where the daily drinkers had the lowest IQ.
Finding B: Counseling and medication greatly increases smokers\' chances of quitting
Finding C: These results are very similar to those expected from the parallel models that exist between certain personality traits and being overweight in humans, suggesting that dogs are indeed a promising model for experimentally investigating obesity in humans.
Finding D: Do UK TV Alcohol Advertisements Abide by the Code of Broadcast Advertising? Probably not. This is brilliant.

Medicine_401_p$Medicine_294_p$Medicine_t.text:
Finding A: Many care home staff were never or almost never aware of a resident being taken out of the home for their enjoyment (34%, n = 520); or an activity planned around a resident\'s interests (5%, n = 234).
Finding B: At that time, the rates of the primary efficacy outcome in the higher-dose otamixaban group was 4.7% (the one selected to go forward) and was 5.6% in the UFH-pluseptifibatide group (adjusted RR, 0.848; 95% CI, 0.662-1.087) but the lower-dose group fulfilled the prespecified criteria for futility with a RR of more than 1 (primary efficacy outcome, 6.3%; RR, 1.130; 95% CI, 0.906-1.408) and was discontinued.
Finding C: Diagnosis and treatment of #oralcancer are assoc w/ changes in sexual behavior, regardless of tumor #HPV status
Finding D: The study shows how the progression of prion diseases to the brain is slowed if animals have previously been infected with a gut worm.
Medicine_401_p$Medicine_294_p$Medicine_t.displayed_text:
Finding A: Many care home staff were never or almost never aware of a resident being taken out of the home for their enjoyment (34%, n = 520); or an activity planned around a resident\'s interests (5%, n = 234).
Finding B: At that time, the rates of the primary efficacy outcome in the higher-dose otamixaban group was 4.7% (the one selected to go forward) and was 5.6% in the UFH-pluseptifibatide group (adjusted RR, 0.848; 95% CI, 0.662-1.087) but the lower-dose group fulfilled the prespecified criteria for futility with a RR of more than 1 (primary efficacy outcome, 6.3%; RR, 1.130; 95% CI, 0.906-1.408) and was discontinued.
Finding C: Diagnosis and treatment of #oralcancer are assoc w/ changes in sexual behavior, regardless of tumor #HPV status
Finding D: The study shows how the progression of prion diseases to the brain is slowed if animals have previously been infected with a gut worm.
